title: Children of the damned
creator_credit: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Lawrence P Bachmann Productions, Ben Arbeid and Anton M Leader
brief_description: Six children that no one seems to know where they came from and when a psychologist attempts to find out the future of mankind is placed in jeopardy. Cast includes Ian hendry, Alan Badel, Barbara Ferris, Alfred Burke.
creator_credit_for_label: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Lawrence P Bachmann Productions, Ben Arbeid and Anton M Leader
